      Add a hook to all Constructor's of this class

      Add a hook to all Method's of this class with a specific name
      static Class<?> ReflectClass.findClass(String className) 
      static Class<?> ReflectClass.findClass(String className, ClassLoader loader)
      This is the same as using Class.forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader) only that this method handles a few issues that some times occurs when parsing a ClassLoader.
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.fromClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Attach a Class to a new instance of ReflectClass
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.fromName(String className) 
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.fromName(String className, ClassLoader loader)
      Find a Class based on class name and return a new ReflectClass instance with the located Class attached to it
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.fromReceiver(Object receiver)
      Attach the Class of a receiver to a new instance of ReflectClass and add the receiver itself to be used with this instance whenever invoking members from it
      Object ReflectField.getValue() 
      Object ReflectField.getValue(ReflectMember.Result result)
      Get the value from this field
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.instantiateClass(Class<?> clazz, Object... arguments) 
      static ReflectClass ReflectClass.instantiateName(String className, ClassLoader loader, Object... arguments)
      This is the same as ReflectClass.fromName(String, ClassLoader), only this method will also instantiate the class using the constructor matching the parsed arguments.
